Tidy chemical data

Nan Xiao <https://nanx.me>

Source: vignettes/tidychem.Rmd
tidychem.Rmd

Introduction

The tidychem package offers a lightweight R interface for accessing RDKit via the RDKit Python API.

Walkthrough 

library("tidychem")
mols <- "smi-multiple.smi" |>
  tidychem_example() |>
  read_smiles()

# ECFP4
mols |> fp_morgan()

# similarity
# mols |> fp_morgan |> sim_tanimoto

# matrix
mols |> fp_morgan(explicit = TRUE)
df <- "logd74.tsv" |>
  tidychem_example() |>
  read_tsv()
y <- df$logD7.4
mols <- df$SMILES |> parse_smiles()
mols

# matrix of 2D/3D descriptors
x <- mols |> desc_2d()
x
x[which(is.na(x))] <- 0
library("glmnet")

cvfit <- cv.glmnet(x, y)
plot(cvfit)

fit <- glmnet(x, y)
plot(fit)
head(coef(fit, s = cvfit$lambda.min, exact = TRUE), n = 30)
